document_data.name: Avalon
document_data.Description: Avalon's coat was an even white in color. He had large, intelligent eyes, a broad chest and long, muscular legs. The stallion had a flowing white mane and tail.{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3251}}
